location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 284: Lieutenant-Colonel Samuel Hennell, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to Arthur Malet, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Samuel Hennell forwards copies of his letters to His Excellency Lieutenant-Colonel Justin Sheil CB, Her Majesty's Minister at the Court of Persia. The letters (nos. 249, 269 and 274) are not included here, but nos. 269 and 274 do appear earlier in the file (see ff.88-89A and ff.96-106).
